short_summary: Waskesiu Beaver Glenn Sewer Replacement, Prince Albert National Park
description: The project involves the replacement of a sewer line in Beaver Glenn Campground within Prince Albert National Park. The estimated value of this project is between 250,001 &;gt; 500,000 dollars, including taxes. The Contractor must perform and complete the work within 10 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title and Description

Waskesiu Beaver Glenn Sewer Replacement, Prince Albert National Park
Parks Canada Agency is seeking a contractor to replace the identified sewer line in Beaver Glenn Campground. The estimated value of the project is between $250,001 and $500,000, including taxes.

#### Tender Information

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01006141
*   **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0122/A
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 20, 2022, 4:00 PM (15:00 hours)
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Procurement Category:** Consulting and Related Services (CNST)

#### Mandatory Site Visit

An optional site visit is scheduled for September 13, 2022, at 2:00 PM (14:00 hours). Interested bidders are required to attend the visit and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend. Bidders may be requested to sign an attendance sheet.

#### Queries and Clarifications

All technical and contractual queries should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing, at least 5 business days prior to the tender closing date.

#### Notice and Attachments

This notice and the attached documentation are available on the Government of Canada's buying and selling website at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

The contractor must complete the replacement of identified sewer line in Beaver Glenn Campground within 10 weeks from the contract award.
Contractors must perform and complete the Work within 10 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
To assist with bonding and insurance requirements, this project is estimated at a value between $250,001 and $500,000.
 
Please use one of the Canadian Government's official languages (English or French) in all correspondence. [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders)

**Official Contact Information**

*   **Name:** Aarondeep Maan
*   **Email:** aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** (403) 585-7139
*   **Fax:** 1-855-983-1808
